title: AirPods maker Luxshare invests in EV production as Apple Car rumors continue
content:
Luxshare has become a key supplier of Apple as of late. The Chinese company, which assembles AirPods and most recently iPhones, announced today its joint venture with The Chery Group. Chery is an electric vehicle maker based in China.

more…

The post AirPods maker Luxshare invests in EV production as Apple Car rumors continue appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: AirPods maker Luxshare announced today its joint venture with The Chery Group, an electric vehicle maker based in China.
